svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Vertical axis measures the average number of years of total schooling across all education levels, for the population
aged 15-64. Horizontal axis measures the share of population living below 3.10$ international dollars per day. Colours
represent world regions. Bubble sizes are proportional the total country population.
Share of population living below $3.10 per day
Source: World Bank – WDI, Lee and Lee (2016)
